code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CodeOutput(_ref){let{code}=_ref;const[copied,setCopied]=useState(false);const handleCopy=()=>{if(!navigator.clipboard){alert("Clipboard API not supported");return;}navigator.clipboard.writeText(code).then(()=>{setCopied(true);setTimeout(()=>setCopied(false),500);}).catch(()=>{alert("uh oh!");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"code",style:{position:"relative"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCopy,style:{position:"fixed",top:230,right:230,padding:"4px 8px",fontSize:"0.8rem",cursor:"pointer",borderRadius:"4px",border:"none",backgroundColor:copied?"green":"#007bff",color:"white",userSelect:"none",zIndex:10},children:copied?"oki done :3":"copy code to clipboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{style:{whiteSpace:"pre-wrap",paddingTop:"30px"},children:code})]});}export default CodeOutput;
